AT.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
AT.description: Als Wirt einer ruhigen alten Schänke am Rande der Stadt hat sich Luchs den Großteil seines Lebens nach einem Ehrenkodex gerichtet, der seit Generationen vom Vater an den Sohn weitergegeben wird: "Wenn unsere hoch verehrten Gäste endlich eintreffen, musst du sie wie deine eigene Familie behandeln." Leider hatte die Schänke seit ihrer Eröffnung noch keinen einzigen Gast, weshalb Luchs nichts anderes übrig blieb, als Kristalle, die wichtigste Energiequelle der Insel, auszugraben und zu verkaufen, um sich seinen Lebensunterhalt zu verdienen. Und während einer dieser routinemäßigen Ausgrabungen stößt er auf eine holde Maid, die in einem gewaltigen Kristall gefangen ist. Als sie schlagartig erwacht, führt dies zu einer ganzen Reihe unerwarteter Ereignisse voller fieser Feinde, faszinierender Fähigkeiten und mannigfaltiger Mysterien... Features: Sieben Heldinnen, sieben Geschichten - Jede der sieben Heldinnen, die in die Schänke einzieht, hat ihre ganz eigene Geschichte zu erzählen, und je besser du sie kennenlernst, desto mehr neue Spezialangriffe kannst du freischalten, mit denen sie dir dann im Kampf zur Seite stehen kann. Strategische Kämpfe, bei denen jeder Zug zählt - "Kegle" so viele Feinde wie möglich mit nur einem Wurf um. Du musst Nahkampf-, Fernkampf- und magische Angriffe entfesseln, um Feinde in der vordersten Reihe in ihre Kameraden zu schleudern und maximalen Kollateralschaden zu verursachen. Durch Handwerkskunst zu neuen Fertigkeiten - Wenn du an Offenen Kämpfen teilnimmst und dich für StreetPass™ registrierst, kannst du nicht nur neue Fähigkeiten freischalten, sondern seltene Gegenstände bekommen, mit deren Hilfe du neue Fertigkeiten erschaffen kannst, um das Schlachtenglück zu deinen Gunsten zu wenden. Anpassbarer Schwierigkeitsgrad und noch viel mehr - Du kannst zwischen Leicht, Normal und Schwer wählen, durch Vorspulen den Kampf auf Wunsch beschleunigen oder in der Video- und Bildergalerie in Erinnerungen schwelgen.

AU.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
AU.description: Residing on the outskirts of town as the proprietor of a quiet, rustic inn, Luchs has lived through much of his life proudly clinging to a code of honour passed down from father to son for generations: "When our cherished guests finally arrive, think of them as nothing less than family." Unfortunately, the inn has not yet had even a single guest since its foundation, leaving Luchs no choice but to excavate and sell crystals — the island’s most valuable fuel source — in order to make ends meet. It is during one such routine excavation that he happens upon a beautiful maiden encased inside a massive crystal, and her abrupt awakening triggers a series of unexpected events that include foul fiends, astonishing abilities, and miraculous mysteries... Features: Seven Heroines, Seven Stories - Each of the seven heroines who come to inhabit the inn have their own stories to tell, and building relationships with them will unlock new, specialised attacks to aid in combat when they join the battle party. Strategic Combat Makes Every Turn Count - "Bowl" over as many enemies with a single strike as possible, challenging players to line up melee, ranged and magical attacks so frontline enemies are knocked into others for maximum collateral damage. Craft Your Way to New Skills - In addition to unlocking new abilities, participating in Free Battles and registering for Street Pass™ can provide rare crafting items for use in creating new skills to help turn the tides of battle. Adjustable Difficulty Levels and More - Players can toggle among Easy, Normal and Hard difficulties, use the Fast Forward feature to speed up combat as desired, or relive fond memories via in-game movie and art galleries.

BG.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
BG.description: Residing on the outskirts of town as the proprietor of a quiet, rustic inn, Luchs has lived through much of his life proudly clinging to a code of honour passed down from father to son for generations: "When our cherished guests finally arrive, think of them as nothing less than family." Unfortunately, the inn has not yet had even a single guest since its foundation, leaving Luchs no choice but to excavate and sell crystals — the island’s most valuable fuel source — in order to make ends meet. It is during one such routine excavation that he happens upon a beautiful maiden encased inside a massive crystal, and her abrupt awakening triggers a series of unexpected events that include foul fiends, astonishing abilities, and miraculous mysteries... Features: Seven Heroines, Seven Stories - Each of the seven heroines who come to inhabit the inn have their own stories to tell, and building relationships with them will unlock new, specialised attacks to aid in combat when they join the battle party. Strategic Combat Makes Every Turn Count - "Bowl" over as many enemies with a single strike as possible, challenging players to line up melee, ranged and magical attacks so frontline enemies are knocked into others for maximum collateral damage. Craft Your Way to New Skills - In addition to unlocking new abilities, participating in Free Battles and registering for Street Pass™ can provide rare crafting items for use in creating new skills to help turn the tides of battle. Adjustable Difficulty Levels and More - Players can toggle among Easy, Normal and Hard difficulties, use the Fast Forward feature to speed up combat as desired, or relive fond memories via in-game movie and art galleries.

BE.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
BE.description: Résidant à la périphérie de la ville en tant que propriétaire d'une auberge rustique et calme, Luchs a vécu une grande partie de sa vie en suivant fièrement le code d'honneur transmis de père en fils dans sa famille depuis des générations : « Lorsque nos clients respectés arriveront enfin, traitons - les comme notre propre famille. » Malheureusement, l'auberge n'a pas accueilli un seul client depuis sa création, obligeant Luchs à déterrer et vendre des cristaux, la source d'énergie la plus précieuse de l'île, pour joindre les deux bouts. C'est au cours d'une de ces fouilles de routine qu'il trouve une magnifique jeune fille enfermée dans un cristal massif. Son réveil brusque déclenche une série d'événements inattendus mettant en scène des démons immondes, des capacités étonnantes et des mystères miraculeux... Caractéristiques : Seven Heroines, Seven Stories - Each of the seven heroines who come to inhabit the inn have their own stories to tell, and building relationships with them will unlock new, specialised attacks to aid in combat when they join the battle party. Des combats stratégiques ou chaque tout compte : renversez autant d'ennemis que possible en un seul coup. Les joueurs devront enchainer les attaques de mêlée, à distance, et magiques afin de repousser les ennemis qui se trouvent en première ligne sur les autres pour un maximum de dégâts collatéraux. Fabriquez vos nouvelles compétences : en plus de déverrouiller de nouvelles aptitudes, participer aux batailles libres et s'inscrire sur Street Pass™ peut vous accorder de rares objets d'artisanat à utiliser pour créer de nouvelles compétences qui vous aideront à changer le cours de la bataille. Niveaux de difficulté réglables et plus : les joueurs peuvent choisir entre les modes de difficulté Facile, Normal et Difficile, utiliser la fonction d'avance rapide pour accélérer le combat à volonté, ou revivre de bons souvenirs grâce à la galerie de films et d'images dans le jeu

Adjustable Difficulty Levels and More - Players can toggle among Easy, Normal and Hard difficulties, use the Fast Forward feature to speed up combat as desired, or relive fond memories via in-game movie and art galleries.

ES.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
ES.description: Luchs vive en las afueras de la ciudad, donde regenta una tranquila y rústica posada. Se ha pasado toda la vida siendo fiel al código del honor que se ha transmitido en su familia durante generaciones: "Cuando lleguen nuestros queridos huéspedes, pensad en ellos como si fuesen miembros de vuestra propia familia." Por desgracia, la posada todavía no ha recibido a ni un solo huésped desde su inauguración. Es por eso que a Luchs no le queda más remedio que buscar y vender cristales para llegar a fin de mes, puesto que son la fuente de combustible más valiosa de la isla. Un día, mientras buscaba cristales, se encuentra con una bella doncella encerrada dentro de un gigantesco cristal. Su abrupto despertar provocará una serie de acontecimientos inesperados entre los que se incluyen malvados enemigos, habilidades increíbles y misterios milagrosos... Características: Siete heroínas, siete historias: cada una de las siete heroínas que llegarán a vivir en la posada tendrá su propia historia. Al entablar amistad con ellas, desbloquearás nuevos ataques especiales que serán muy útiles en combate cuando se unan a tu equipo. Sistema de combate estratégico en el que cada turno es importante: "derriba" a tantos enemigos como puedas con un solo golpe. Los jugadores tendrán que elegir entre ataques cuerpo a cuerpo, a distancia y mágicos para que los enemigos de primera línea golpeen a los que tengan detrás y conseguir maximizar así los daños colaterales. Consigue crear nuevas habilidades: además de desbloquear habilidades, los combates libres y registrarte en StreetPass™ te permitirá conseguir objetos únicos que podrás usar para crear nuevas habilidades que te permitirán cambiar el devenir de la batalla. Niveles de dificultad ajustables y mucho más: los jugadores podrán seleccionar entre los niveles de dificultad Fácil, Normal y Difícil. Usa la opción "Acelerar" para que el combate se desarrolle al ritmo que desees, o bien revive bellos recuerdos gracias a las galerías de vídeo y arte que incluye el juego.

HU.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
HU.description: Residing on the outskirts of town as the proprietor of a quiet, rustic inn, Luchs has lived through much of his life proudly clinging to a code of honour passed down from father to son for generations: "When our cherished guests finally arrive, think of them as nothing less than family." Unfortunately, the inn has not yet had even a single guest since its foundation, leaving Luchs no choice but to excavate and sell crystals — the island’s most valuable fuel source — in order to make ends meet. It is during one such routine excavation that he happens upon a beautiful maiden encased inside a massive crystal, and her abrupt awakening triggers a series of unexpected events that include foul fiends, astonishing abilities, and miraculous mysteries... Features: Seven Heroines, Seven Stories - Each of the seven heroines who come to inhabit the inn have their own stories to tell, and building relationships with them will unlock new, specialised attacks to aid in combat when they join the battle party. Strategic Combat Makes Every Turn Count - "Bowl" over as many enemies with a single strike as possible, challenging players to line up melee, ranged and magical attacks so frontline enemies are knocked into others for maximum collateral damage. Craft Your Way to New Skills - In addition to unlocking new abilities, participating in Free Battles and registering for Street Pass™ can provide rare crafting items for use in creating new skills to help turn the tides of battle. Adjustable Difficulty Levels and More - Players can toggle among Easy, Normal and Hard difficulties, use the Fast Forward feature to speed up combat as desired, or relive fond memories via in-game movie and art galleries.

IT.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
IT.description: Luchs, il proprietario di una tranquilla locanda rustica di periferia, ha vissuto gran parte della sua esistenza aderendo a un codice d'onore trasmesso da padre in figlio per generazioni: "Quando arriveranno i nostri graditi ospiti, dovrai trattarli come se fossero la tua famiglia." Purtroppo però, dall'apertura ad oggi, la locanda non ha mai avuto ospiti, quindi per sopravvivere Luchs non può fare altro che scavare e vendere cristalli, la fonte di energia più preziosa dell'isola. Un bel giorno, durante la sua solita attività, Luchs trova una bellissima fanciulla rinchiusa in un cristallo enorme e il suo risveglio improvviso mette in moto una serie di eventi imprevisti, pieni di nemici malvagi, abilità incredibili e misteri miracolosi... Caratteristiche: Sette eroine, sette storie - Ognuna delle sette eroine che arrivano alla locanda ha una storia da raccontare; interagendo con loro si sbloccheranno nuovi attacchi specializzati da usare in combattimento quando parteciperanno a una battaglia. Combattimento strategico, ogni turno è importante - Abbatti più nemici possibile con un colpo solo organizzando attacchi in mischia, a distanza e magici per buttare giù le linee frontali e farle ricadere su quelle indietro, ottenendo una reazione a catena. Crea nuove abilità - Oltre a sbloccare nuove abilità, partecipando alle battaglie e attivando la funzione StreetPass™ potrai ottenere oggetti artigianali rari con cui creare nuove abilità che potrebbero cambiare le sorti della battaglia. Livelli di difficoltà regolabili e altro - I giocatori possono scegliere la modalità facile, normale e difficile, usare la funzione di accelerazione per rendere più rapidi i combattimenti o crogiolarsi nei ricordi con filmati e gallerie di immagini.

LT.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
LT.description: Residing on the outskirts of town as the proprietor of a quiet, rustic inn, Luchs has lived through much of his life proudly clinging to a code of honour passed down from father to son for generations: "When our cherished guests finally arrive, think of them as nothing less than family." Unfortunately, the inn has not yet had even a single guest since its foundation, leaving Luchs no choice but to excavate and sell crystals — the island’s most valuable fuel source — in order to make ends meet. Craft Your Way to New Skills - In addition to unlocking new abilities, participating in Free Battles and registering for Street Pass™ can provide rare crafting items for use in creating new skills to help turn the tides of battle. Adjustable Difficulty Levels and More - Players can toggle among Easy, Normal and Hard difficulties, use the Fast Forward feature to speed up combat as desired, or relive fond memories via in-game movie and art galleries.

LV.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
LV.description: Residing on the outskirts of town as the proprietor of a quiet, rustic inn, Luchs has lived through much of his life proudly clinging to a code of honour passed down from father to son for generations: "When our cherished guests finally arrive, think of them as nothing less than family." Craft Your Way to New Skills - In addition to unlocking new abilities, participating in Free Battles and registering for Street Pass™ can provide rare crafting items for use in creating new skills to help turn the tides of battle. Adjustable Difficulty Levels and More - Players can toggle among Easy, Normal and Hard difficulties, use the Fast Forward feature to speed up combat as desired, or relive fond memories via in-game movie and art galleries.

LU.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
LU.description: Résidant à la périphérie de la ville en tant que propriétaire d'une auberge rustique et calme, Luchs a vécu une grande partie de sa vie en suivant fièrement le code d'honneur transmis de père en fils dans sa famille depuis des générations : « Lorsque nos clients respectés arriveront enfin, traitons - les comme notre propre famille. » Malheureusement, l'auberge n'a pas accueilli un seul client depuis sa création, obligeant Luchs à déterrer et vendre des cristaux, la source d'énergie la plus précieuse de l'île, pour joindre les deux bouts. C'est au cours d'une de ces fouilles de routine qu'il trouve une magnifique jeune fille enfermée dans un cristal massif. Son réveil brusque déclenche une série d'événements inattendus mettant en scène des démons immondes, des capacités étonnantes et des mystères miraculeux... Caractéristiques : Seven Heroines, Seven Stories - Each of the seven heroines who come to inhabit the inn have their own stories to tell, and building relationships with them will unlock new, specialised attacks to aid in combat when they join the battle party. Des combats stratégiques ou chaque tout compte : renversez autant d'ennemis que possible en un seul coup. Les joueurs devront enchainer les attaques de mêlée, à distance, et magiques afin de repousser les ennemis qui se trouvent en première ligne sur les autres pour un maximum de dégâts collatéraux. Fabriquez vos nouvelles compétences : en plus de déverrouiller de nouvelles aptitudes, participer aux batailles libres et s'inscrire sur Street Pass™ peut vous accorder de rares objets d'artisanat à utiliser pour créer de nouvelles compétences qui vous aideront à changer le cours de la bataille. Niveaux de difficulté réglables et plus : les joueurs peuvent choisir entre les modes de difficulté Facile, Normal et Difficile, utiliser la fonction d'avance rapide pour accélérer le combat à volonté, ou revivre de bons souvenirs grâce à la galerie de films et d'images dans le jeu

MT.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
MT.description: Residing on the outskirts of town as the proprietor of a quiet, rustic inn, Luchs has lived through much of his life proudly clinging to a code of honour passed down from father to son for generations: "When our cherished guests finally arrive, think of them as nothing less than family." NO.description: Residing on the outskirts of town as the proprietor of a quiet, rustic inn, Luchs has lived through much of his life proudly clinging to a code of honour passed down from father to son for generations: "When our cherished guests finally arrive, think of them as nothing less than family." Adjustable Difficulty Levels and More - Players can toggle among Easy, Normal and Hard difficulties, use the Fast Forward feature to speed up combat as desired, or relive fond memories via in-game movie and art galleries.

NL.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
NL.description: Luchs woont aan de rand van stad en is de eigenaar van een stille, rustieke herberg. Hij heeft het grootste deel van zijn leven geleefd volgens een erecode die al generaties lang van vader op zoon wordt doorgegeven:"Als onze geliefde gasten eindelijk aankomen, beschouw ze dan als niets minder dan familie." Helaas is er sinds de opening nog geen enkele gast geweest, zodat er voor Luchs niets anders opzat dan kristallen (de meest waardevolle brandstofbron op het eiland) op te graven en te verkopen om de eindjes aan elkaar te knopen. Tijdens een routineopgraving stuit hij op een beeldschone maagd in een enorm kristal, en haar abrupte ontwaking zet een reeks onverwachte gebeurtenissen in gang met boosaardige demonen, verbazingwekkende vaardigheden en wonderlijke mysteries... Eigenschappen: Zeven heldinnen, zeven verhalen - Alle zeven heldinnen die in de herberg komen wonen, hebben hun eigen verhaal te vertellen. Door relaties met ze op te bouwen, speel je nieuwe en speciale aanvallen vrij voor gevechten als ze zich aansluiten bij het reisgezelschap. Strategische gevechten laten elke beurt tellen - "Kegel" zo veel mogelijk vijanden omver met één aanval. Spelers worden uitgedaagd om contactaanvallen, afstandsaanvallen en magische aanvallen aaneen te rijgen, zodat vijanden in de frontlinie op andere vijanden vallen voor maximale nevenschade. Baan je craftend een weg naar nieuwe vaardigheden - Door nieuwe vaardigheden vrij te spelen, mee te doen aan Free Battles en je te registreren voor StreetPass™, kun je zeldzame craft-items voor nieuwe vaardigheden krijgen die het tij van de strijd kunnen keren. nstelbare niveaus en nog veel meer - Spelers kunnen kiezen uit de niveaus Easy, Normal en Hard, gevechten naar wens versnellen met de functie Fast Forward of goede herinneringen ophalen via in-game films en illustraties.

NZ.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
NZ.description: Residing on the outskirts of town as the proprietor of a quiet, rustic inn, Luchs has lived through much of his life proudly clinging to a code of honour passed down from father to son for generations: "When our cherished guests finally arrive, think of them as nothing less than family." Unfortunately, the inn has not yet had even a single guest since its foundation, leaving Luchs no choice but to excavate and sell crystals — the island’s most valuable fuel source — in order to make ends meet. PL.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
PL.description: Residing on the outskirts of town as the proprietor of a quiet, rustic inn, Luchs has lived through much of his life proudly clinging to a code of honour passed down from father to son for generations: "When our cherished guests finally arrive, think of them as nothing less than family." It is during one such routine excavation that he happens upon a beautiful maiden encased inside a massive crystal, and her abrupt awakening triggers a series of unexpected events that include foul fiends, astonishing abilities, and miraculous mysteries... Craft Your Way to New Skills - In addition to unlocking new abilities, participating in Free Battles and registering for Street Pass™ can provide rare crafting items for use in creating new skills to help turn the tides of battle. Adjustable Difficulty Levels and More - Players can toggle among Easy, Normal and Hard difficulties, use the Fast Forward feature to speed up combat as desired, or relive fond memories via in-game movie and art galleries.

PT.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
PT.description: Lunchs vive nos subúrbios da cidade e é proprietário de uma pensão tranquila e rústica. Orgulhosamente, rege a sua vida por um código de honra transmitido de pai para filho ao longo de gerações: "Quando os nossos estimados convidados finalmente chegarem, tratem-nos como se fossem família." Infelizmente, a pensão ainda não recebeu nenhum hóspede desde a inauguração, pelo que Lunchs não tem outra hipótese se não escavar e vender cristais – a fonte de combustível mais valiosa da ilha – para subsistir. Durante uma escavação de rotina, depara-se com uma bela donzela presa dentro de um enorme cristal. O seu despertar abrupto desencadeia uma série de acontecimentos inesperados que incluem horríveis inimigos, capacidades extraordinárias e mistérios miraculosos... Características: Sete heroínas, sete histórias – Cada uma das sete heroínas que habita a pensão tem a sua própria história para contar; desenvolve relações com elas para desbloqueares novos ataques especializados que te auxiliam no combate quando elas se juntarem à batalha. O combate estratégico faz com que cada turno conte – Derruba o máximo de inimigos possíveis com um único ataque, desafiando jogadores para realizar ataques corpo a corpo, à distância e mágicos, para que os inimigos da linha da frente batam contra outros e consigas causar o máximo de danos colaterais. Cria novas capacidades – Além de desbloqueares novas técnicas, ao participares em Batalhas Livres e registares-te para o StreetPass™, podes obter raros objetos que podes usar para criar novas capacidades que te ajudam a mudar a sorte da batalha. Níveis de dificuldade ajustáveis e muito mais – Os jogadores podem escolher três níveis de dificuldade (Fácil, Normal e Difícil), usar a funcionalidade de Avanço Rápido para acelerar o combate, ou reviver as boas recordações através dos filmes do jogo e galerias de arte.

RU.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
RU.description: Поселившись на окраине города и открыв там тихий деревенский трактир, Лухс большую часть своей жизни гордо придерживался кодекса чести, который в его семье передается от отца к сыну на протяжении многих поколений: «Когда наши заветные гости наконец-то к нам пожалуют, относись к ним не иначе, как к членам семьи». К сожалению, в трактир пока еще никто не заглянул с момента его основания, поэтому у Лухса не осталось другого выбора, кроме как добывать и продавать кристаллы, – самый ценный источник топлива на всем острове, чтобы свести концы с концами. И вот однажды во время раскопок он наткнулся на прекрасную девушку, заточенную внутри огромного кристалла. Ее пробуждение повлекло за собой череду непредвиденных событий. Ложные друзья, невероятные способности и чудесные тайны... Особенности: Семь героинь, семь историй – у каждой из семи героинь, которые обитают в трактире, есть своя интересная история. Подружитесь с ними и открывайте новые, специальные атаки, которые помогут вам в сражениях. Благодаря стратегической системе боя каждый шаг на счету – выводите как можно больше врагов из равновесия за один удар. Используйте оружие ближнего и дальнего боя, а также магические атаки, чтобы отбросить стоящих впереди врагов в других противников и нанести максимальный дополнительный урон. Уникальная система навыков – в дополнение к открытию новых способностей, принимайте участие в бесплатных битвах, а если зарегистрироваться на StreetPass™ в сможете получить уникальные предметы, которые помогут вам получить новые навыки и повернуть ход битвы. Регулируемые уровни сложности и многое другое – игроки могут переключаться между легким, обычным и тяжелым уровнем сложности, пользоваться функцией быстрой перемотки, чтобы ускорить сражения, либа вновь окунуться в приятные воспоминания с помощью галереи игровых роликов и снимков

SE.name: Lord of Magna: Maiden Heaven
SE.description: Residing on the outskirts of town as the proprietor of a quiet, rustic inn, Luchs has lived through much of his life proudly clinging to a code of honour passed down from father to son for generations: "When our cherished guests finally arrive, think of them as nothing less than family." Unfortunately, the inn has not yet had even a single guest since its foundation, leaving Luchs no choice but to excavate and sell crystals — the island’s most valuable fuel source — in order to make ends meet.
